text: Leonardo "Léo" da Silva Passos (born 13 March 1999) is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a forward for América Mineiro, on loan from Palmeiras. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Palmeiras |2019 |Série A |0||0||1Appearances in the Campeonato Paulista||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |Londrina (loan) |2019 |Série B |1||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !1!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Associação Atlética Ponte Preta players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Londrina Esporte Clube players
title: Léo Passos
